extendedInfo.description: Taskkill is a taskkiller plugin for Locale/Tasker that allows you automate killing a specific app. TaskKill does not operate on its own, and requires either Tasker, or LocaleTaskkill does not specifically require root, but it is recommended.The following options are * Simple: (Does not need root) Asks the target app to quit. Does not force the matter at all.* Advanced: (Requires Root) Kills the PID of the target app. Apps with background processes may startup again.* Extreme: (Requires Root And ICS+) Recommended method. This kills the target app using the same method as going to the app under settings and clicking "Force Close"* Hardcore: (Requires Root) Only use as a last resort. This kills the target app by disabling its package and re-enabling it.**WARNING Hardcore may remove shortcuts from the homescreen.Thanks to daweefolk & unkmar for testing.

reviews.title: Samsung tab 2
reviews.comment: Exactly what i needed, app works great and as expected.

reviews.comment: Probably doing something wrong, but I can\'t find it in Tasker!
reviews.author: Send Bas

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: I\'ve only used it for one process so far, but it worked perfectly and easily.   For anyone that has installed this and wonder where it is, It adds itself to the \"Plugin\" section of the Action Categories.
reviews.author: Ashley Waugh

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Very nice app indeed, but can\'t choose \"Extreme mode\" because the \"apply\" button gets below the lower border of the screen on my Galaxy Mini. Please fix!!!
reviews.author: Anton Borodko

reviews.title: Essential Tasker plugin
reviews.comment: Spent an inordinate amount of time trying to get Tasker to kill certain apps but to no avail, and just when I was about to give up I stumbled upon this plugin. Kills all apps, no surrender!
reviews.author: Dan Cross

reviews.title: Only the \"SIMPLE\" option is available
reviews.comment: Can only use the simple option.. please help!!  no choice for advanced or extreme in the dropdown!!!
reviews.author: kendall barwick

reviews.title: Works brilliantly!
reviews.comment: I have been searching and searching and trying all types of scripting methods to kill Waze via Tasker with no success.  Installed this, and immediately it worked!  I didn\'t even need to use the most aggressive setting!  Well done, I say!
reviews.author: J Womack

reviews.title: Oh my god!!!
reviews.comment: I was pushed to write super long codes in order to close certain apps with tasker combining the root option and the regular one with some time the app even restarting after that but this is just IT!! It works so well, 1 line, 1 command and bye bye the app. Simply AWESOME!! Thank you so much for this app!

reviews.title: Works perfect
reviews.comment: Looking for something like this for ages...now i can kill all those apps that start themselves, like facebook that start even there is no internet connection. Good work :)

reviews.title: Brilliant.
